title: Walk-the-Talk (WOL) Workshop for Agile Learning Practices

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Focuses on helping practicing professionals acquire immediately applicable learning strategies. Combines smartphone-based microlearning content with hands-on practice sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can share work-related knowledge/experiences with peers in an open chatroom at least twice a week and incorporate feedback within two weeks
Learners can apply agile learning principles (iterative improvement, collaboration) to develop work problem-solving solutions through three or more stages by the end of the 4-week course
Learners can achieve a 20% or higher improvement in psychological empowerment (work self-efficacy) survey scores within six months of WOL implementation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
